data.meta_description: Archdiocese of San Fernando, Pampanga Most Rev. Florentino G. Lavarias, D.D.Archbishop Address:  Archbishop’s Residence, Arzobispado de Pampanga, San Jose, City of San Fernando, 2000 PampangaContact: Tel.: (045) 435-1970 / (045) 402-4717Email: rcamea0314@yahoo.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/rcasfpWebsite: https://rcasf.com/ Vicar General: Rev. Fr. Francis F. DizonChancellor: Rev. Fr. Danny Q. Nacpil Vicariate of Blessed Trinity Vicariate of Christ the King Vicariate of Holy Family Vicariate … Archdiocese of San Fernando, Pampanga Read More »
